mapper.select: SELECT m.member_code AS memberCode ,m.status = 2 AS isSubscribed ,count(c.construction_id) AS constructionCount FROM member m LEFT JOIN construction c on m.member_id = c.creator_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} And m.status != 0 GROUP BY 1,2

SELECT member_id AS memberId, platform AS platform, name AS name, email AS email, member_code AS memberCode img_url AS imgUrl FROM member m WHERE m.email = #{email} AND platform = #{platform} AND status = 1
INSERT INTO member( member_id, platform, name, email, member_code, img_url, reg_date, status )SELECT nextval('member_id_seq') #{platform}, #{name}, #{email}, #{memberCode}, #{imgUrl}, now(), 1
SELECT count(1) FROM member WHERE platform = #{platform}
